Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez hit three home runs
Spencer Arrighetti pitched a no-hitter into the 8th inning
Others: Houston Astros routed the Philadelphia Phillies and Taijuan Walker 10-0
Jose Altuve stole home in the first inning
Spencer Arrighetti finished with 11 strikeouts and four walks while allowing two hits in his longest outing as a professional in either the majors or minors
Taijuan Walker was tagged for six runs on 13 hits in six innings. The Phillies have lost his last nine starts
Others (continued): The Phillies have lost the series 2-1
The Astros have won for just the third time in nine games
